```{r tabla}
estadisticas_policiales %>%
  dplyr::select(Delito,
                Fecha,
                Victima,
                Edad,
                Genero,
                Provincia,
                Canton) %>%
  datatable(
    colnames = c(
      "Delito",
      "Fecha",
      "Victima",
      "Edad",
      "Género",
      "Provincia",
      "Cantón"
    ),
    options = list(
      pageLength = 10,
      language = list(url = '//cdn.datatables.net/plug-ins/1.10.11/i18n/Spanish.json')
    )
  )

```
